MOT and Chi have no interaction while Chi is writing letter. Chi writes a lot and does not interrupt to ask questions of any of the adults. Chi has invented spellings for some words , but her ideas are good and she reads it back fluently

u.a: MOT points for Chi to go to the dining room table

CHAT.comment: Chi makes herself comfortable at dining room table; Mot stays in the living room with EXP and INV2; Mot watches Chi , who writes for a total of about 5 minutes.
various shuffling noises and glasses clinking in the background , occasionally
MOT , INV1 and INV2 talk about Mot's experience taking the GED
MOT tells about older sibling who babysit to keep busy; then Chi joins in to talk about going to the movies to see Aladdin and Alive.
